str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A hired servant, hireling. From misthoo; a wage-worker.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: It is a care, it is an object of anxiety, it concerns. A primary verb; to be of interest to, i.e. To concern.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A sheep. Probably neuter of a presumed derivative of probaino; something that walks forward, i.e., a sheep.
